change_summary.what_changed: The download option for the Windsurf Editor changed from Windows to macOS
specific_changes: Download option changed from Windows to macOS
New download options for Apple Silicon and Intel are available

strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may slightly improve user experience for macOS users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: The company may be expanding its support for different operating systems
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to affect the company's competitive position

key_findings: The Windsurf Editor now supports macOS
opportunities: Increased market share among macOS users
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback and address any compatibility issues that arise

key_insights: The Windsurf Editor now supports macOS
business_impact: The change may slightly improve user experience for macOS users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to affect the company's competitive position
